      • getBidsForOffer

        public List<Bid> getBidsForOffer(Offer offer,
                                 String apiKey)
        Gets a list of bids for a specific offer.
        Parameters:
        offer - The offer whose bids are requested.
        apiKey - The API key of the organisation to which the bids belong to.
        Returns:
        A List of Bids. that are associated to a specific offer and its APi key.

      • getOffersByPlayer

        public List<Offer> getOffersByPlayer(Player player,
                                     String apiKey)
        Gets a list of all offers which were created by a specific player.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who has created offers.
        apiKey - The API key of the organisation to which the offers belong to.
        Returns:
        A List of Offers with all offers a player has created.

      • getAllOffers

        public List<Offer> getAllOffers(String apiKey)
        Gets all Offers which can be found on the marketplaces of an organisation.
        Parameters:
        apiKey - The API key of the organisation to which the offers belong to.
        Returns:
        A List of all Offers, which belongs to the organisation with the associated apiKey.

      • getAllMarketPlaces

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The List of MarketPlaces which belong to the passed API key.

      • getMarketplace

        public MarketPlace getMarketplace(int id,
                                  String apiKey)
        Gets a specific marketplace from the data base that is associated with the id and the API key.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the requested marketplace.
        apiKey - The API key of the organisation to which the marketplaces belongs to.
        Returns:
        The requested MarketPlace that belongs to the passed id and API key.

        public MarketPlace deleteMarketPlace(int id,
                                     String apiKey)

        Parameters:
        id - The id of the marketplace that should be removed.
        apiKey - The API key of the organisation to which the marketPlace belong to.
        Returns:
        The MarketPlace that is removed from the database.
